about.heading: About uSupport
about.paragraph: uSupport is a mental health, psychosocial and wellbeing platform designed for young people and their carers where privacy and safety is a priority.
about.paragraph_2: Let’s face the stress together and cope with all the challenges of life.

contact-us.contact_form_heading: Have a question? Don’t hesitate to contact us.

Hello,

contact-us.modal_text: We will get back to you as soon as possible
contact-us.paragraph: We will reply to your email shortly. Make sure you enter your email address correctly

download-app.paragraph: Now available for iOS and Android

find-yourself.heading: Be your best self
find-yourself.paragraph: Feeling lost? Not understood? Not heard? Not motivated? Not happy?
find-yourself.paragraph_2: Not... really you? We’ll help you find yourself again.

hero.heading_1: Start your journey towards better<1></1> mental health & wellbeing
hero.paragraph_1: A platform that respects your privacy and safety. Your wellbeing is our priority! uSupport provides personalized and discreet psychological care.
hero.paragraph_1_1: Be your best self! Your mental health matters.

how-it-works.heading: Easy and Quick
how-it-works.paragraph_summary: In just a few clicks you can get the help you need. Fully anonymously.
how-it-works.paragraph_normal: In just a few clicks you can get the help you need. Fully anonymously.

meet-our-providers.heading: Meet our providers
meet-our-providers.paragraph: Explore your emotions further. Engage in conversations with professionals and access tools and strategies to effectively address the challenges you encounter in your everyday life.

page.password: Please enter your password to access the site
page.cookie_banner_text: This website uses cookies to enhance and secure your browsing experience. By using our website, you agree to our <0>Cookie Policy</0>.

sos-center.heading: SOS center
sos-center.no_results: There are no results for the current selected country and language.

we-help.paragraph_1: Welcome to uSupport, an innovative platform dedicated to supporting the mental health of adolescents, young people, parents, and caregivers. Our goal is to provide a confidential, secure, and trusted space where you can access mental health resources or seek consultations anytime, anywhere. On uSupport, you can explore your thoughts and feelings and learn how to manage them with the help of articles on our platform and guidance from our providers.
we-help.paragraph_2: At uSupport, we believe that mental health and well-being are essential to every person’s overall health and development. We are committed to enhancing the mental health and psychosocial well-being of adolescents and young people by providing accessible, affordable, and high-quality support services. Our goal is to reduce the stigma surrounding mental health and ensure that every young person receives the support they need to thrive.
we-help.paragraph_3: uSupport was developed with the support of United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) in close consultation with young people in Kazakhstan. Our key partner is the Republican Center of Mental Health under the Ministry of Health of Kazakhstan.
we-help.paragraph_4: Our team consists of experienced professionals who are actively working with young people across various regions of Kazakhstan. These professionals bring a wide range of expertise, covering diverse topics such as emotional well-being, coping strategies, stress management, and mental health challenges faced by young people today. By engaging directly with youth, our team is able to offer personalized support and address the unique mental health needs of adolescents and young people in different communities.
we-help.paragraph_5: uSupport is more than just a digital platform; it is a vital part of the larger mental health and psychosocial support ecosystem in the countries where we operate. By connecting young people with existing mental health resources, we aim to contribute towards universal access to quality prevention, care, and support for all.
we-help.paragraph_6: We invite you to join us in our mission to improve the mental health and well-being of young people. Whether you are a young person seeking support, a mental health professional looking to make a difference, or a partner interested in supporting our work, we welcome you to be a part of the uSupport community. Together, we can create a positive impact and ensure every young person has the opportunity to thrive.
we-help.paragraph_7: Disclaimer: uSupport is a platform that builds mental health literacy and supports young people to understand better issues related to their psychosocial and emotional wellbeing and overall mental health. It is designed to maximize awareness of mental health by providing anonymous access to information and consultations to interested users. It is not designed to assist in cases of serious crises such as abuse and exploitation, severe mental health conditions that may cause feelings of suicide, self-harm, or any other medical emergencies. uSupport cannot offer medical or clinical advice, it can only put young people in contact with local mental health professionals who can suggest referrals and guide users to seek specialized medical help within their national health care system. In case of emergency, users are directed to reach out to country-specific suicide hotlines or ambulance services. uSupport provides information and support to young people over the age of 10. The
we-help.paragraph_7_2: stipulate that parents or legal guardians are expected to provide consent for users who are minors – in accordance to local country legislation. uSupport cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of age-related or other information provided by users.

information-portal.heading: Information portal
information-portal.paragraph_1: Access free resources developed with experienced providers in the field of mental health.
information-portal.paragraph_2: Our extensive collection of valuable resources is continuously improving to ensure that we address all essential subjects that will support you in reaching your highest potential.
information-portal.paragraph_3: Within the portal, you'll discover articles authored by experts, learn self-development techniques, and stay updated with topics that interest you

meet-our-providers-overview.heading: Meet providers you can consult with
meet-our-providers-overview.text: Our providers will assist you in gaining a deeper understanding of your situation and how best to deal with it.

my-qa-landing.heading: My Q&A
my-qa-landing.subheading: Ask your questions and our team of professionals will try their best to help you
my-qa-landing.ask_anonymous_card_text: Each and every question is fully anonymous and no one could see who asked it

mascot-header-MyQA.heading: My Q&A
mascot-header-MyQA.subheading_text2: linked to you. The answers will be public, so you can see issues that others are facing as well.

coupon-information.heading: Want free sessions with providers?
coupon-information.how_text: Instead of paying for sessions with your credit card, choose "coupons" when booking your next session!
coupon-information.where_text: Follow UNICEF on Instagram & TikTok, where coupon codes may appear from time to time. Our partners may also provide coupon codes on their social media. So follow them to get notified.
coupon-information.where_text_2: Coupons are limited and can run out based on demand, so grab them and book your free session.
coupon-information.reason_2: Get coupon codes from social media

my-qa-page.my_qa_answer_title: How does the My Q&A work?
my-qa-page.my_qa_answer_text: The My Q&A is a feature that allows you to ask questions and receive answers from the uSupport providers.

organization-overview-page.heading: Organization overview
organization-overview-page.subheading: Detailed overview of the profile of the organization you selected

how-it-works-my-qa.heading: How it works
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_1: Clients can post an anonymous private message to uSupport in a language of their choice, using the website or app.
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_2: An approved uSupport provider will answer your question
how-it-works-my-qa.subheading_3: All Clients can see the response but no one knows it's from you! It goes into a common area with relevant #tags for future reference.
